languages.text: "Мое почтение, господин Версериан. Верный сенешаль никогда не оставляет Лорд-капитана, верно? Рада видеть, что вы также уцелели". {n}Арджента ободряюще улыбается офицеру.{/n}
"Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, господин Версериан. Верный сенешаль никогда не оставляет Лорд-капитана, верно? Рада видеть, что вы также уцелели". {n}Арджента ободряюще улыбается офицеру.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see that you live." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
"Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see that you live." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
"Master Werserian, accept my respect. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
"Master Werserian, accept my respect. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
"Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}
"Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

languages.text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアン、忠実な家令長は決してロード・キャプテンを見捨てたりはしない。そうでしょう？あなたが生きていてくれて、私も嬉しい」{n}彼女はアベラルドに励ますような微笑みを向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアン、忠実な家令長は決してロード・キャプテンを見捨てたりはしない。そうでしょう？あなたが生きていてくれて、私も嬉しい」{n}彼女はアベラルドに励ますような微笑みを向ける。{/n}

languages.text: “忠诚的总领绝对不会抛弃他的领主舰长，是吧，韦尔森大师？看到你还活着，我也很高兴。”{n}她对阿贝拉德露出了鼓励的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森总领，请接受我的敬意。忠诚的总领绝对不会抛弃他的领主舰长，是吧？看到你还活着，我也很高兴。”{n}她对阿贝拉德露出了鼓励的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: «Maestro Werserian. Un Senescal leal nunca abandona a su Lord Capitán, ¿verdad? Me alegra mucho verle con vida». {n}Muestra a Abelard una sonrisa alentadora.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Maestro Werserian, cuenta con todo mi respeto. Un Senescal leal nunca abandona a su Lord Capitán, ¿verdad? Me alegra mucho verle con vida». {n}Muestra a Abelard una sonrisa alentadora.{/n}

languages.text: "Meister Werserian. Ein treuer Truchsess lässt seinen Lord Captain niemals im Stich, nicht wahr? Ich bin ebenso froh, Euch am Leben zu sehen." {n}Sie lächelt Abelard aufmunternd an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meister Werserian, ich drücke Euch meine Hochachtung aus. Ein treuer Truchsess lässt seinen Lord Captain niemals im Stich, nicht wahr? Ich bin ebenso froh, Euch am Leben zu sehen." {n}Sie lächelt Abelard aufmunternd an.{/n}

languages.text: « Maître Werserian. Je vois qu'un sénéchal loyal n'abandonne jamais {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}. Je me réjouis de vous savoir en vie. » {n}Elle adresse à Abélard un sourire encourageant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes respects, maître Werserian. Je vois qu'un sénéchal loyal n'abandonne jamais {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}. Je me réjouis de vous savoir en vie. » {n}Elle lui adresse un sourire encourageant.{/n}

languages.text: "Üstat Werserian. Sadık bir Seneşal, Lord Kaptan'ının yanından asla ayrılmaz, öyle değil mi? Ben de sizi sağ salim gördüğüme bir o kadar sevindim." {n}Argenta, onu yüreklendirmek istercesine Abelard'a gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian. A loyal Seneschal never abandons his Lord Captain, does he? I am just as glad to see you alive." {n}She gives Abelard an encouraging smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Werserian. Sadık bir Seneşal, Lord Kaptan'ının yanından asla ayrılmaz, öyle değil mi? Ben de sizi sağ salim gördüğüme bir o kadar sevindim." {n}Argenta, Abelard'a yüreklendirircesine gülümsüyor.{/n}
